      • getReportsSum

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getReportsSum(java.lang.String fromDate,
                                                                      java.lang.String toDate)
                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                                      java.lang.Exception
        Gets the reports counters sum. In this counters (like issue book count, issue cancel count, etc.) of all books are added. This counters are used in data visualization on client side.
        Parameters:
        fromDate - the date from which report is to be generated
        toDate - the date to which report is to be generated
        Returns:
        the reports sum
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • getBookIssueStatus

        public int getBookIssueStatus(User user,
                              Book book)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Checks whether book is already issued by user or not.
        Parameters:
        user - : user with whose respect issue status is to be checked
        book - : book whose issue status is to be checked
        Returns:
        the book issue count (0 implies book is not issued by user)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
